skins.shipDescription: Erebus-class monitor ®C Erebus, Hull Number I02!
skins.selfIntroduction: Erebus, my name, sounds surreal? My predecessor was a ship which carried explorers to the North Pole and never returned... like a journey into the abyss. Please pay more attention to my sisters!
skins.acquisition: Commander, is that you? I'm Erebus. I followed your voice and have come from afar.
skins.login: Commander, I'm always here, awaiting for your summons...
skins.details: I am not the harbinger of death... I am just..... guiding them after their times are up
skins.secretaryIdle1: Did you just have an out-of-body experience?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'll always protect my little sisters.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I have to say, this warmth, I don't dislike it.
skins.secretaryTouch: Allow me to channel forth the whispers of the dead...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... ... uh... ... I'm sorry, it seems like I was having an out-of-body experience.

skins.shipDescription: Those who embrace the shadows will find only an illusory happiness... But for me, that much is sufficient.
skins.acquisition: Those who embrace the shadows will find only an illusory happiness... But for me, that much is sufficient.
skins.details: I am still but a shadow. The only difference is, I've found a small, small thing to strive for.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, there's no need to be reserved. I still have a lot of chocolate.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, just being able to watch you like this, and give you chocolate, is enough to make me happy.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Were you able to touch happiness, Commander?

skins.shipDescription: "I am the witch of Hallow's Eve, here to guide your soul into the ever darkness"... that's what the concept of the Halloween witch is about, right?
skins.acquisition: "I am the witch of Hallow's Eve, here to guide your soul into the ever darkness"... that's what the concept of the Halloween witch is about, right?
skins.login: The Halloween event has started. But, I'm supposed to wait here until it's my time to come out.
skins.details: Terror really wanted to go to the Halloween party with me, but... I...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Legend has it that real monsters come out on Hallow's Eve... Shall we search for them?
skins.secretaryIdle2: These festivities have diluted the ever darkness with noise and light... but it's not such a bad thing.
skins.secretaryIdle3: T-trick or treat...? Oh, right, you can have this special bewitched candy.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, have you been possessed by a perverted ghost?
